name: Code Quiz
description: This application is a Quiz with multiple choices that tests your coding knowledge, it gives you 75 seconds to answer 5 questions, each time your answer is wrong it punishes you by 10 seconds.

name: Day Scheduler
description: This aplication is a scheduler to help the user organize daily tasks, it uses moment.js to track the time and changes the hours background color according to past, present and future.
technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Jquery, Moment.js.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: This application shows the weather conditions in a city of the users choice, it also shows the next five days forecasts and saves the last searches in the local storage.
technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, DOM manipulation, Yahoo Weather API, Jquery

name: Movie Hub
description: This application shows trending movies, new movies, movies by genre and theaters nearby.
technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Materialize, Moment.js, Yahoo API, Movie GLU API, The Movie DB API.

name: Petcation Station
description: This App for pet owners and pet sitters to connect and make arrangements regarding the care for the furry friends.
technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Materialize, Node Express, Uploadcare, SQL, Sequelize, Cookies.

name: Password Generator
description: This app generates passwords according to the users desire regarding to size and type of characteres.

name: Cloudtronics
description: This app is a store that sells electronics products.
technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, Mongoose, Apollo, React, CSS in JS, Bcrypt, JWT, Redux, Indexed Database
